EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Tides
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Your caster level of druid, cleric, and wavedasher spells as well as monk finishing moves is equal to your combined Monk, Cleric, and Druid level to a maximum of 20.
Clubs and Scepters are now considered Ki Weapons, and you can be Centered while using them.
Each core of Wavedasher grants +2 caster levels and max caster levels to all water and ice spells. +2 monk levels to all water finishing moves +5 Cold, Force and Positive Spellpower

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Soak
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies hit by your Wavedasher spells take one stack of Soaked. Soaked can stack up to 10 times. Soak: You take 1% more Cold and Bludgeoning damage. In addition, your Druid pet is now a Crab, and its level is determined by your combined Monk, Cleric, and Druid levels.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Wavedash
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate this toggle to change how your character moves as a column of water springs up beneath your feet, carrying you forward at great speeds. On land, you move at a base rate that is 20% faster than players normally do, but cannot turn or back up as quickly as a standard movement flow can. You are also constantly propelled forward by your Wavedashing. In the water, you swim at a base rate that is 50% faster than your base movement speed. While Wavedashing, your Water spells apply 2 stacks of Soaked instead.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Riptide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You can use your Wisdom to determine your Reflex Saving Throw. You may now cast Healing spells while underwater.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Horrific Wilting
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: This spell evaporates moisture from the body of each subject creature, dealing 1d8+8 points of damage per caster level. (Maximum damage 20d8+160.) This spell is especially devastating to water type outsiders like Water Elementals, and to Plants which instead take 1d10+10 points of damage per caster level. (Maximum damage 20d10+200.) Constructs are immune to this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Heart of the Ocean
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +4 Wisdom. You have Protection from Fire on you at Caster Level 10. When this is expended, it returns after 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Bubble Blast
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector: Send out a flurry of bubbles in a cone. Allies in the cone heal for 1 point of Positive energy per Caster Level for each Spell Like Ability you have from this tree. 10/8/6 second cooldown. SP Version: 6 SP Ki Version: 6 Ki

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Bubble Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector: Requires Bubble Blast. Enemies in the cone take 1 Cold or 1 Bludgeoning damage per caster level for each Spell Like Ability you have from this tree, randomly picked. This damage scales with the relevant Spell Power. SP Version: 6 SP Ki Version: returns 10 Ki

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Spell Critical I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Cold, Force and Positive Spell Critical Chance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Harness the Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Spellpoints or Max Ki.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Max Ki
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[20/40/60] Max Ki. Rank 3: +1 Passive Ki Generation.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Hear the Ocean
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Swim, Listen, Heal. Rank 3: +1 Reflex Saving Throw

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Cold Snap
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enemies in an area take 1 Cold or Bludgeoning per caster level per SLA in this tree for each stack of Soaked they have. This clears all stacks of Soaked from enemies affected. 12/10/8 s cooldown SP Version: 10 SP Ki Version: returns 10 Ki

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Swift Swimmer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain Evasion while Swimming.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Spell Critical II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Cold, Force and Positive Spell Critical Chance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Brave the Ocean
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[3/6/10] Cold Resistance, +[1/2/3] Magical Resistance Rating

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Ride the Waves
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to all saving throws

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Aquatic Sphere
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Conjure a bubble of friendly water that follows you and heals you and allies over time. Allies near the sphere heal for 1 point of Positive energy per Caster Level for each Spell Like Ability you have from this tree. (Rate of healing and movement are analogous to Flaming Sphere.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Rising Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you cast a Cold damage spell, you gain +5 to your Cold Spell Power for 6 seconds. This stacks up to [1/3/5] times.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Spell Critical III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Cold, Force and Positive Spell Critical Chance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Cleansing Streams
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Adds a cleanse effect to your Healing Spells and Healing Ki that removes Slows and Sticky.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Hydrated Rebuke
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Upon being struck in melee, a crushing wave of pure water has a chance to explode from your body, knocking down the enemy hit and all other enemies in a small area. This deals 1 Cold or 1 Bludgeoning damage per caster level for each SLA you have taken in this tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Lifeguard
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[5/10/15] Swim skill

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Spell Critical IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2% Cold, Force and Positive Spell Critical Chance

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Improved Water Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose your Affinity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Ocean Stance Affinity
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain partial benefits from the Ocean even if you are not in that stance: +1 Wisdom +1 Passive Ki Regen +1% Dodge Cap +1 all Saving Throws

EnhancementSelection.Name: Water Domain Affinity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Cold and Positive Spellpower per Character Level

EnhancementSelection.Name: Water Elemental Affinity
EnhancementSelection.Description: +2 Caster Level and Maximum Caster Level with Cold and Positive Spells

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Wisdom
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Healing Tide
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector SLA: Send out a large wave of water in a straight line that Allies it hits are healed for 1 point of Positive energy per Caster Level for each Spell Like Ability you have from this tree. Enemies hit by the wave take 1 Cold or 1 Bludgeoning damage per caster level for each Spell Like Ability you have from this tree, randomly picked. This damage scales with the relevant Spell Power. [20/18/12] second cooldown. SP Version: 12 SP Ki Version: 30 Ki

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Hotspring
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The bonuses to caster level and max caster level you gain from the cores also apply to positive energy spells.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Drown
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Multiselector SLA: Target enemy has a bubble placed over their head. If they need to breathe, they must make a Fortitude saving throw every 2 seconds (d20+ your Swim skill) or die. Enemies immune to Death effects are immune to Drown. 20 second cooldown. SP Version: 30 SP Ki Version: 50 k

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Greater Water Form
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Enhance your Affinity

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Water Domain Affinity
EnhancementSelection.Description: Creeping Cold spells now apply in an AoE. Turn Undead now applies Greater Creeping Cold to all enemies.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Water Elemental Affinity
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are now immune to Cold damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Wavedasher: Water Spell Focus
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +5/10/15 Cold, Force, and Positive Spellpower. Rank 3: +5% Positive, Force, and Cold Spell critical damage
